definitions.definition: Expression and exchange of individual ideas through talking with other people; also, a set instance or occasion of such talking.
examples: I had an interesting conversation with Nicolas yesterday about how much he's getting paid.
You need to improve conversation in foreign languages.

definitions.definition: The back-and-forth play of the blades in a bout .
The protocol -based interaction between systems processing a transaction .
Interaction ; commerce or intercourse with other people; dealing with others.
Behaviour , the way one conducts oneself; a person's way of life .
Engagement with a specific subject , idea, field of study etc.

main_definition: Expression and exchange of individual ideas through talking with other people; also, a set instance or occasion of such talking. [from 16th c.]
secondary_definitions: ( fencing ) The back-and-forth play of the blades in a bout .
( computing , networking ) The protocol -based interaction between systems processing a transaction . [from 20th c.]
( obsolete ) Interaction ; commerce or intercourse with other people; dealing with others. [14th–18th c.]
( archaic ) Behaviour , the way one conducts oneself; a person's way of life . [from 14th c.]
( obsolete ) Engagement with a specific subject , idea, field of study etc. [16th–18th c.]
